title: [Large-scale] Problem-Based Mathematics Project to Strengthen Scientific Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematics (calculus, statistics) and scientific reasoning foundations
context.additional_context: A blended environment combining online collaboration using smartphones and weekly offline workshops. Learners participate in simulation activities that solve real-world social problems through mathematical approaches.

learning_goals: Design a process for solving real-world social issues (e.g., energy efficiency analysis, infectious disease spread modeling) through mathematical modeling.
Write evidence-based argumentative essays grounded in data analysis results.
Collaboratively derive optimal mathematical solutions considering diverse stakeholder perspectives.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
